feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Use Cloudflare Turnstile in booker by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18755
  • feat: add transcription as attachment by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18740
  • fix: routing form list overflow by @MehulZR in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18686
  • chore: migrate low-risk 3 /auth pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18753
  • chore: Remove Chromatic GitHub workflow by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18780
  • fix: handle cancelation reason when user is host by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18681
  • chore: Double available memory on api/book/event by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18790
  • fix: Initialize Hubspot client in CRMService by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18789
  • fix: custom templates on team plan by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18792

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.3...v4.9.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: requires confirmation for event type atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18729
  • feat: add option to disable deleting calendar credentials for CalendarSettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18759
  • chore: Fix sublogger/better logging by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18808
  • perf: create (use-page-wrapper) route group and replace WithLayout from /bookings/[status] page + 8 low-risk single pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18737
  • fix: Load plain dynamically by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18571
  • fix: HubSpot is not working for team events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18812
  • refactor: better observability in api routes by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18810
  • refactor: bookings failures should be caught faster by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18817
  • fix: use userId as ratelimit identifier by @chronark in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18803
  • fix: flaky test in organization.spec by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18828
  • perf: Use one PageWrapper instance for every non-settings / non-bookings page in App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18747
  • fix: flickering in /bookings/[status] page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18836
  • chore: update naming by @maxprilutskiy in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18837
  • fix: AvailabilitySettings and Booker atom time zones by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18833
  • fix: use columnPinning API by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18830
  • fix: checkly tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18842
  • chore: migrate org domain /[user] page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18715
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18845
  • fix: dual-sided incentives on webapp by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18846
  • feat: "cal.isBookingDryRun" to be used for Routing form as well by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18832
  • refactor: Specific error status codes by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18847
  • feat: Internal Notes for bookings by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18804
  • fix: attribute assignment hosts by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18831
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18860
  • chore: migrate /apps/[slug] page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18848
  • chore: migrate /apps/installed pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18869
  • fix: re-implement filter components in /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18655
  • fix: Hide events in the event type assignment tab for teams does not save by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18868
  • fix: convert People filter on /insights/routing from single select to multi select by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18735
  • refactor: v2 return booking host email by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18864
  • chore: migrate /auth/verify-email by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18876
  • chore: Only import Sentry when needed by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18882
  • perf: prerender routes in main navigation by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18883
  • chore: migrate /apps/categories pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18871
  • chore: app router - /payment pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18152
  • perf: replace getServerSessionForAppDir usages with our original getServerSession function by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18897
  • chore: migrate /apps/installation pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18870
  • chore: migrate /auth/logout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18901
  • chore: migrate /auth/verify by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18902
  • feat: Add booking and user creation source by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18768
  • feat: add command list to DataTable column header by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18867
  • chore: migrate /auth/login page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18903
  • chore: split data-table/components/filters/index.tsx by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18679
  • perf: layout persistence and reduced bundle size by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18889
  • fix: Checkly flake by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18904
  • fix: Missing salesforce options in Routing Form by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18884
  • chore: use ColumnFilterType enum by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18915
  • fix: Add Stripe past_due to active team subscription status by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18917
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18922
  • fix: make workflow page not static by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18925
  • feat: routing forms for api v2 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18885
  • fix: Add uid and event responses to tasker calendar event by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18930
  • chore: remove unused getStaticProps file by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18928
  • fix: disable canceling booking if no internal note is selected by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18926
  • fix: managed events with internal notes by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18933
  • fix: safe parse query schema signup by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18927
  • fix: allow nullable cancelation reason by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18939
  • chore: migrate /auth/verify-email-change by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18942
  • chore: migrate /auth/setup by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18941
  • fix: remove stale cache for column visibility state by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18944
  • fix: admin should see all routing forms (Router position) by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18931
  • fix: show sort state on column header by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18950
  • fix: API V1 cancellationReason fallback/default and doc update by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18946
  • fix: Tasker CRM - parse full app metadata by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18961
  • feat: Setting for rescheduling past bookings by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18358
  • chore: migrate /auth/saml-idp by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18943
  • chore: migrate pages/index.tsx to app/page.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18960
  • chore: move /auth/verify out of /future by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18952
  • fix: invalid iCal download link must not crash booking page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18966
  • chore: migrate /auth/sso pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18951
  • chore: migrate /auth/forgot-password pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18945
  • chore: Salesforce - Add additional logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18959
  • fix: Exclude .next from TS & fixup ImageResponse types by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18972
  • chore: migrate /routing-forms to app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18976
  • feat: routing forms integration for booker atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18726
  • fix: eventtype null cant be booked error by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18975
  • fix: clear cancellation reason on other select by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18982
  • fix: Wrong username with -{DOMAIN} in case of an autoAcceptEmail when synced through SCIM by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18384
  • feat: skip confirm step in booker by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18773
  • fix: re-design DateRangeFilter by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18924
  • perf: don't fetch all the hosts by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18319
  • fix: modify error handling of incompleteBookingWriteToRecord by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18998
  • feat: ui playground by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18995
  • fix: Disable sms/whatsapp action for trialing teams by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18896
  • fix: few flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19010
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19015
  • feat: keep column visibility on query params by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19013
  • feat: show ooo forwarding and emoji when not available by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18054
  • feat: setting to enable weights on attribute in route by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18592
  • perf: don't fetch all the hosts #18319 followup by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19021
  • chore: add default form field support for booker embed routing url by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19023
  • fix: add check for cal video by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19020
  • fix: update style of data table's column resizer by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19026
  • fix: stats on /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18985
  • chore: add logs for debugging by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19012
  • chore: remove dead code regarding insights by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19022
  • perf: remove WithLayout from more App Router routes by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19036
  • fix: add missing metadata to /auth/setup by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19035
  • perf: move /teams page to (use-page-wrapper)/(main-nav) route group to use its shared layout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19037
  • chore: migrate /apps/[slug]/setup by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19039
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19045
  • fix: Global e2e failure by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19055
  • fix: semi colon revealed in UI by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19052
  • chore: tech debt clearing - getServerSession has a dead arg: res by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19053
  • fix: username visible in private booking link by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19054
  • fix: trash icon is aligned now by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19049
  • refactor: v2 api e2e performance by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19028
  • chore: Salesforce - Add logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19047
  • fix: remove padding for custom data table header by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19058
  • fix: remove unused attribute columns for /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19059
  • fix: clean up fields columns on /insights/routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19062

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.4...v4.9.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Crash of getSchedule by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19073
  • fix: some modifications to logging event detail input by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19070

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.5...v4.9.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Update CODEOWNERS for Platform and infra-related code by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18938
  • fix: empty state search messaging event page by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19064
  • chore: run webhookTriggers cron job every minute by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19086
  • fix: do not force cancellation reason for platform by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19087
  • fix: Ensure previous slots do appear if the month search param is removed by @sanchitttt in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18097
  • fix: nullish check on insights routing by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19097
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19098
  • feat: attio app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19102
  • fix: preview.html by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18978
  • chore: enable more router props by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19088
  • feat: v2 organization bookings endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18875
  • chore: Don't require checks for /help updates by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19089
  • fix: null check by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19111
  • fix: add orgId to EventTeamAssignmentTabPlatformWrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19109
  • chore: Flatmap today's bookings by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19104
  • fix: startdate filter and ui sync on bookings page by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19113
  • chore: create event-type input lengthInMinutesOptions by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19114

New Contributors

  • @TusharBhatt1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.6...v4.9.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Trigger Docker release on publish by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19121
  • feat: enable booker atom for non org team events by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19125
  • fix: check searchParams existence by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19128
  • feat: v2 bookings return cancelledBy and rescheduledBy by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19110
  • fix: RSC boundary errors by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19130
  • chore: Salesforce add more logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19106
  • fix: change error message for cloudflare turnstile by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19135
  • feat: track who updated routing form by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19079
  • fix: logo for org team event types by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19131
  • chore: migrate api for team creation to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19105
  • chore: migrate api/availability/calendar to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19099
  • perf: make metadata generation light for event type single page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19143
  • chore: migrate api/cancel to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19074
  • chore: tech debt clearing — remove HeadSeo from components where not needed by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19151
  • fix: typos in docs/ by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19144
  • docs: Embed docs Help updated with metadata passing details by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19124
  • chore: refactor apiRouteMiddleware and add it to some api routes in App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19146
  • test: Scenario that replicates the crash in production by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19071
  • feat: add option to disable sending transcription emails by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19065
  • fix: source typo in EditUserForm.tsx by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19157
  • fix: source typo in bookingScenario.ts test by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19162

New Contributors

  • @luzpaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19144

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.7...v4.9.8
